pr_title: [FLINK-15478][table-planner-blink] Fix FROM_BASE64 code gen result type

timeline.message: [FLINK-15478][table-planner-blink] Fix FROM_BASE64 code gen result type
Add test for FROM_BASE64 in ScalarFunctionsTest

timeline.bodyText:
We can not use new String directly, because we don't know the default coder must be UTF-8.
Maybe we can use BinaryString.fromBytes?
timeline.author: JingsongLi

replies.bodyText:
Do you mean we return BinaryString for fromBase64, or just like BinaryString.fromBytes(...).toString() ?
Or we can make it explicit UTF8 like CAST in ScalarOperatorGens:L942 ?
replies.author: libenchao
